attributes.description:
Perfect eyebrows mean perfect arches. (Wax & Tweezers)

First, you and your wax therapist discuss your preferences and how you want your brows shaped.
Then, the wax is carefully applied in the direction of hair growth.
Once dry, the wax is removed opposite the direction of hair growth.
attributes.name: BROW SHAPING

attributes.description: Hair ends only
attributes.name: DRY HAIRCUT

attributes.description: A follow up appointment after your initial gel nail strengthen or extension manicure. We recommend a gel rebalance service every 3 - 4 weeks to keep your natural nails healthy. Completed with gel polish application, cuticle work (e-file).
attributes.name: INFILL / GEL REBALANCE

attributes.description:
A complete manicure with application of our Signature, strengthening products such as Apex Gel / Rubber Base  (builder in the bottle) with Signature gel polish colour application. The service is completed with cuticle treatment (oil).

A complete manicure includes cuticle care, prep, shape and file of the natural nail plate using a range of professional nail tools and an E-file for a longer-lasting gel manicure of up to 3+ weeks.
attributes.name: STRENGTHENING MANICURE ( NATURAL NAILS )

attributes.description:
A complete manicure followed by application of our Signature gel polish colour range. The service is completed with cuticle treatment (oil).

A complete manicure includes cuticle care, prep, shape and file of the natural nail plate using a range of professional nail tools and an E-file for a longer-lasting gel manicure of up to 3+ weeks.
attributes.name: CLASSIC GEL MANICURE ( NATURAL NAILS )

attributes.description:
A complete manicure cuticle work (e-file) followed by application of cuticle treatment (oil).

A complete manicure includes cuticle care, prep, shape and file of the natural nail plate using a range of professional nail tools and products.
Please note removal services includes only removal of UV/LED gel enhancements. Removal of acrylic enhancement will incur an additional charge as these nail enhancements may require more time.
attributes.name: CLASSIC MANICURE (WITH REMOVAL)

attributes.description:
A complete manicure followed by application of cuticle treatment (oil). Please note, a removal is not included in these services. 
A complete manicure includes cuticle care, prep, shape and file of the natural nail plate using a range of professional nail tools and an E-file for a longer-lasting gel manicure of up to 3+ weeks.
attributes.name: CLASSIC MANICURE (NATURAL NAILS)

attributes.description: OLAPLEX
attributes.name: HAIR HYDRATION

attributes.caption: Long length
attributes.description: OLAPLEX
attributes.name: HAIR HYDRATION

attributes.description:
About this service:

Patch test recommendation 24/48h prior to the appointment on a walk in basis at the venue
If the root length is more than 3 cm the venue may charge extra
Colour price correction - only by consultation in the salon
    Blow-dry not included

Restrictions:

A patch test is required 24/48 hours prior to treatment. Please call the salon once the booking has been confirmed to arrange this or walk in at least 24 hours before the treatment
This service does not include a blow dry

Patch test:

To make sure your skin doesn’t react to the products used in your treatment, please book a patch test at least 48 hours before your appointment.

Already had one in the past 6 months at this salon? You might not need to do it again (but please check with the salon to be sure).
attributes.name: ROOTS TOUCH UP / SOLID COLOUR

attributes.description:
Price depends on hair length.                 About this service:
Allergy test recommendation 24/48h prior to the appointment on walking basis at the venue
There may be extra charges for colouring as it depends on hair length, how thick hair is and what kind of colour you have now and what kind of result you would like to get.
Colour correction only by consultation in the salon.

Patch test

To make sure your skin doesn’t react to the products used in your treatment, please book a patch test for at least 48 hours before your appointment.

Already had one in the past 6 months at this salon? You might not need to do it again (but please check with the salon to be sure).
attributes.name: FULL HEAD COLOURING ( Solid Colour, Ombre, Highlights, Babylights, Balayage)

attributes.description:
Eyebrow tinting is for anyone who wants fuller-looking brows.

First, your therapist cleans your brows.
Then the tint is carefully applied and left to process for 10 to 20 minutes.
Next, the tint is removed using cotton pads and swabs.
attributes.name: BROW TINT

attributes.description: Extend your nails to the desired length using our Hard gel or Acrylic Gel systems. Natural feeling and looking nail enhancements. Completed with gel polish application. The service includes cuticle treatment (oil).

attributes.description: Extend your nails to the desired length using our Hard gel or Acrylic Gel systems. Natural feeling and looking nail enhancements. Completed with gel polish application. The service includes cuticle treatment (oil).

attributes.caption: Long
attributes.description: Extend your nails to the desired length using our Hard gel or Acrylic Gel systems. Natural feeling and looking nail enhancements. Completed with gel polish application. The service includes cuticle treatment (oil).
attributes.name: NAIL EXTENSION

attributes.description: Extend your nails to the desired length using our hard gel systems in various techniques for your aspiration. A perfect French will give your nails that immaculate look of a smart looking nail enhancements. The service includes cuticle treatment (oil).
attributes.name: SCULPTED EXTENSION

attributes.description: Extend your nails to the desired length with highly skilled using our hard gel systems.  is sculpted within the nail extension itself using hard gel to  for longer. Natural feeling and looking nail enhancements. Completed with gel polish application. The service includes cuticle treatment (oil).
attributes.name: SCULPTED FRENCH EXTENSION (ART)

attributes.description: Come in for a friendly chat with our hairstylist to discuss a wide range of hair, treatments and hair colour options available in our salon.

attributes.description: A follow up appointment after your initial gel nail strengthen or extension manicure. We recommend a gel rebalance service every 3 - 4 weeks to keep your natural nails healthy. Completed with gel polish application, cuticle work (e-file).
attributes.name: INFILL / GEL REBALANCE

attributes.caption: with hard skin peeling
attributes.description:
Get your feet ready for a special event or a vacation with a complete "makeover".

The treatment includes nail shape correction, cuticle prep (e-file) with gel colour overlay
attributes.name: HYGIENIC PEDICURE

attributes.description: Hair ends only
attributes.name: DRY HAIRCUT

attributes.description:
Classic lashes are semi-permanent extensions placed individually onto each natural lash. Providing a fuller but natural look, they're created for long-term wear.

First, your therapist preps your eyes with eye pads and tape and cleans your eyelashes with a prep solution.
Then, the lash is carefully glued in place according to your desired look.
Lastly, your therapist combs your eyelashes to finish the look.
attributes.name: Classic Individual

attributes.description:
Infills are recommended every 2 weeks and are the best way to maintain your perfect eyelash extensions.

To start, a consultation is done to achieve the best results.
After, sit back while your beautician replaces each missing lash.
To finish, your beautician cross-checks your lashes to ensure there is a complete coverage.
Let the talented eyelash artists at this salon restore your full lashes.
attributes.name: Infills

attributes.description:
A blend of Volume and Classic. The one to choose if you’re struggling to – well – choose.

First up, prep. Your therapist will clean your lashes with eye pads and a prep solution.
Your choice of lashes will be applied – a mixture of individual and volume lashes, to each individual lash – held in place with specialist glue.
Your lashes are combed through to finish the look.
attributes.name: Hybrid

attributes.description:
Full Volume 2D/3D semi-permanent lashes are the most popular advanced technique. Multiple lashes are attached to each individual natural lash without putting any strain on the lashes, creating volume and definition. Ideal for long-term wear.

First, your therapist preps your eyes with eye pads and tape and cleans your eyelashes with a prep solution.
Then, the lash is carefully glued in place according to your desired look.
Lastly, your therapist combs your eyelashes to finish the look.
attributes.name: Full Volume 2D/3D

attributes.caption: SIMPLY BIKINI
attributes.description:
SIMPLY - Tidy up those hairs that stray from the pant line!
G - STRING - Extended bikini, higher than a basic but keeping everything underneath.
BRAZILIAN - Everything but only a strip or triangle is your aim!
HOLLYWOOD - To be bare down there!
attributes.name: BIKINI
